name: Text Analysis
description: sentiment-analysis, text-summarization, language-detection, article-extraction, named-entity-recognition, extract-text from documents and images

api_methods.name: sentiment-analysis
api_methods.description:
Sentiment analysis is the use of natural language processing to systematically identify and extract subjective information. Sentiment analysis is widely applied to  movie reviews and survey responses.

API spec
-----------
max characters allowed: 1000 chars
supported languages: English

NOTE
--------
Support for other languages will come soon.
The API is free during beta period. Pricing will be updated soon.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze the sentiment of this movie review?
What is the sentiment of this text about the latest iPhone?
Please analyze the sentiment of this customer feedback.
How does this article about climate change feel?
Analyze the sentiment of this tweet about the new Marvel movie.
What’s the sentiment of this product review for the new coffee maker?
Can you tell me the sentiment of this blog post about travel?
Analyze the sentiment of this comment on the latest tech gadget.
What’s the sentiment of this paragraph about the new restaurant?
Please analyze the sentiment of this email about the recent conference.

api_methods.name: named-entity-recognition
api_methods.description: Named entity recognition is a task of information extraction that seeks to locate and classify named entities mentioned in unstructured text into pre-defined categories such as person names, organizations, locations, time expressions, quantities, monetary values, percentages, etc.

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the names of people and organizations in this article?
Extract all the locations mentioned in this text.
What are the monetary values and percentages in this document?
Find the time expressions and quantities in this paragraph.
Could you locate and classify the named entities in this unstructured text?
Identify all the person names and organizations in this report.
What are the locations and time expressions mentioned in this passage?
Extract the named entities like quantities and monetary values from this text.
Can you find the percentages and organizations in this article?
Locate and classify all the named entities in this document.

api_methods.name: extract-text-from-files
api_methods.description:
Extract text from files like
"csv, doc, docx, eml, epub, json, html, htm, msg, odt, pdf, pptx, ps, rtf, txt, xls, xlsx, gif, jpg, jpeg, png, tiff, tif, mp3, ogg, wav"

[For more information navigate to the Gitlab repository] (https://gitlab.com/t8511/extract-text-from-files-wiki)

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the text from this PDF document?
I need the text from this Word file in Spanish.
Extract the text from this JPEG image for me.
Please pull out the text from this Excel sheet.
Could you extract the text from this PowerPoint presentation in French?
I’d like the text extracted from this HTML file.
Extract the text from this PNG image in German.
Can you get the text from this RTF document?
Please extract the text from this EPUB book in Italian.
I need the text from this TXT file.

api_methods.name: summarize-text
api_methods.description: Summarize a long article, story, etc.

utterances.utterance: Can you summarize this article about climate change?
I need a brief summary of the story 'The Great Gatsby'.
Summarize the latest news on AI advancements.
Could you give me a summary of the research paper on quantum computing?
Please summarize the long article I just read about space exploration.
I’d like a summary of the book '1984' by George Orwell.
Can you provide a summary of the blog post about healthy eating?
Summarize the article on the history of the internet.
I need a quick summary of the report on renewable energy.
Could you summarize the long essay about ancient civilizations?

api_methods.name: language-detection
api_methods.description:
Find out what all languages are present in your text.

API specs
------------
Max chars: 100000
Returns the probabilities of multiple languages.
Follows ISO 639-1 codes
link for the above codes: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes

[For more information visit Gitlab repository](https://gitlab.com/t8511/language-detection-wiki)

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what languages are in this paragraph?
Identify the languages used in this text.
What languages does this document contain?
Detect the languages present in this article.
Can you analyze the languages in this piece of writing?
What are the languages in this text?
Please determine the languages used in this passage.
Find out the languages in this text.
Could you detect the languages in this document?
What languages are included in this text?
